pages.title: Candle Rituals
pages.text: Once you have crafted the Rune you would like to use and set up your candle ritual, you are probably ready to begin crafting some magical candles. Similar to Runes, hover over the Magical Candle you would like to make in this guide. Hold $(d)SHIFT$() while hovering to reveal the required ingredients.

pages.title: Candle Rituals
pages.text: The items listed must be placed into each corresponding Altar Tile. Order does not matter when slotting the ingredients in. After your items are floating in the tiles, right click the statue with the $(d)Rune$() of your choice to perform the ritual.

pages.title: Cursed Night Candle
pages.text: This Candle causes Blindness surrounding it when lit. Used in some Rituals.          $(d)Hover over the Candle & hold SHIFT for more information on crafting in a ritual.$()

pages.title: Purged Light Candle
pages.text: This Candle gives infinite Water Breathing surrounding it when lit.          $(d)Hover over the Candle & hold SHIFT for more information on crafting in a ritual.$()

pages.title: Nullifier Candle
pages.text: This Candle Nullifies the effects of other surrounding candles. Can be used as a filter. $(d)Hover over the Candle & hold SHIFT for more information on crafting in a ritual.$()
